headline: Don’t Push for Growth in 2026, Push for Yield: The Case for 3 Top Dividend Stocks
summary: Growth stocks have clearly provided much of the total return many investors have seen within their portfolio in recent years. That’s a dynamic some investors clearly expect to continue, with capital inflows into higher-growth stocks continuing to outpace the move in value stocks and companies paying out meaningful dividend yields. That said, the macro environment ... Don’t Push for Growth in 2026, Push for Yield: The Case for 3 Top Dividend Stocks
